# destination

**Instance Property**

The end point of the route.

## Declaration

```swift
var destination: MKMapItem { get }
```

## Discussion

The item in this property may contain additional details that aren’t in the original item you use to create the [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKDirections/Request] object.

## Getting the end points

- **source**: The start point of the route.
